Html:
Would it be possible to add some additional constraints to the optimization routine to allow the defining of minimum hp/mp/hit/crit/etc?

This would make it much easier to develop situational kits, e.g. 8.5 unbuffed health for Naj'entus fight etc., or allow a sanity check when one has several leather pieces available but you don't want to wear every single piece due to mana issues (e.g. New kit increases dps by 50 but knocks 1,000 off your mana pool).

In the same vein, constraints for hit/crit would be useful for fights that require a hit capped hunter or assuring you don't fall under 30% hit cap when using a wind serpent, maintaining a minimum required crit rate to optimize FI uptime, etc.
Yea, I'll try to get those in this week. It shouldn't be too hard to get those added into the available optimizer requirements.
